definition.name: TooltipProvider
definition.description: A provider component that must wrap all tooltip instances. Shares tooltip context across all tooltip components.

delayDuration.description: The default delay duration for all tooltip instances within the provider

skipDelayDuration.description: The delay duration when quickly moving between multiple tooltips

definition.name: Tooltip
definition.description: A root component that wraps the tooltip trigger and content. It manages the state and positioning of the tooltip. Based on Radix UI's Tooltip primitive.

children.description: Must contain TooltipTrigger and TooltipContent components

defaultOpen.description: The open state of the tooltip when it is initially rendered

open.description: The controlled open state of the tooltip

onOpenChange.description: Event handler called when the open state of the tooltip changes

delayDuration.description: The duration from when the mouse enters the trigger until the tooltip gets opened

definition.name: TooltipTrigger
definition.description: The element that triggers the tooltip to open when hovered or focused. Usually wraps an interactive element like a button or icon.

children.description: The element that triggers the tooltip

asChild.description: Change the component to the HTML tag or component provided

definition.name: TooltipContent
definition.description: The component that contains the tooltip content. It handles the positioning and animations of the tooltip popup. Renders in a Portal to avoid z-index issues.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the tooltip content

sideOffset.description: The distance in pixels from the trigger

children.description: The content to be displayed in the tooltip

definition.visualLayout: A floating box with rounded corners, background color, and smooth animations for entry and exit. Supports different slide-in animations based on the tooltip position.
